game.title: Conquer the Crypt

beginning.description: A sudden dimensional shift transports King Bard and his heroes into a world of orcs and magic.
beginning.events: - Fantasy creatures appear and begin battle

synopsis: King Bard's ambush and castle surrender
Search for the key in the dungeon
Empty treasure chests reveal orc treachery
Battle against the dragon to reclaim their home
ending: Dragon's victory and the king's determination to rebuild
Escape to safety from the burning mountain
